text:
We love it when reality stars collide. On April 30, Ronnie Ortiz-Magro was spotted watching the Vanderpump Rules finale with a group of friends, including a few who have appeared on reality TV, at Scheana Shay's Las Vegas condo. In an Instagram Story, Scheana described the scene as "our own reality show in my condo."

How to Watch Vanderpump Rules Season 12 premieres on Tuesday, December 2 at 9/8c on Bravo and streams next day on Peacock. Watch âRaise Your Glass to 11 Seasonsâ special on Tuesday, November 25 at 9/8c on Bravo. Stream on

The friendly hangout came right on the heels of Ortiz-Magro's explosive — and public — fight with girlfriend Jen Harley. After the two traded barbs on social media, it appears that the couple is calling it quits, at least for now.

But, Scheana still has hope that everything will work out for her friend, who shares a new baby girl with Harley. "There are a lot of tumultuous reality relationships, so you never know," the SURver told E! "I mean, they have a kid together, so hopefully they could work it out ... I mean they weren't together very long before she got pregnant, so you never know. But hopefully even if the relationship doesn't work out, I hope they can come together for their daughter and just be good co-parents."

Photo: @scheana/Instagram Stories

Photo: @scheana/Instagram Stories

Photo: @scheana/Instagram Stories

Scheana also shared that she'd hosted the gathering at her place to help cheer up the Jersey Shore star. "[Ronnie] had a rough day," she said. "He was with [recording artist] Mikey P and Mikey and I have been friends and I said, look if [Ronnie] needs a distraction, you guys are welcome to come over and watch the [Vanderpump Rules] finale with me. He can watch me look like an ass ... Everyone came over and we have so much fun. We played Cards Against Humanity … We had a few good laughs."
title: Scheana Shay Hangs Out with Ronnie Ortiz-Magro
